items.title: SF temporarily tightens universal indoor masking requirement & augments vaccination requirements amid Omicron surge
items.summary: Indoor mega-events will require up-to-date vaccinations, including boosters, starting February 1, 2022.

items.title: DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC HEALTH AND COMMUNITY ORGANIZATIONS HOST HOLIDAY GIVEAWAY FOR 5,000 HOUSEHOLDS
items.summary: In partnership with the San Francisco African American Faith-Based Coalition and community organizations, the City is hosting a holiday giveaway for our vulnerable populations in San Franciscans in need
